mapper.select: insert into users(user_no, program_name, id, nickname, password) values(user_no_seq.NextVal, #{programName}, #{id}, #{nickname}, #{password})
select user_no userNo, program_name programName, id, nickname from users where id = #{id}
select user_no userNo, program_name programName, id, nickname from users where nickname = #{nickname}
select user_no userNo, program_name programName, id, password, nickname, photo, location from users where id = #{id} and password = #{password}
